pages.text: $(li)Pumpkin is a fruit block that appears over the Overworld.$(br)$(li)You can use Pumpkins to craft $(l)Pumpkin Bread$(), $(l)Large Pumpkin Slice$(), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/pumpkin_seeds)Pumpkin Seeds$(/l), $(l)Pumpkin Pie$(), $(l)Azuki Curry$(), and a $(l:patchouli:armors/pumpkin_armor)Pumpkin Armor$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).

$(li)This block can be grows up from $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/pumpkin_seeds)Pumpkin Seeds$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can create Carved Pumpkins right clicking while you are holding a pair of $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/shears)Shears$(/l) in your hand and your are pointing to a Pumpkin.
